#BlackMagicCraft #Episode134

In the first part of this Tudor House series I construct the general structure and do all the timbre and brick embellishments. This is how you build a miniature house out of styrofoam, xps foam, insulation foam, or foamcore. 

Windows are from www.shiftinglands.com

WATCH THE WHOL SERIES
PART ONE - STRUCTURE: https://youtu.be/7sHdZTaQTD8
PART TWO - STUCCO: https://youtu.be/ncn6mvZHk-s
PART THREE - SHINGLES: https://youtu.be/JTzZVE1HYuU
PRT FOUR - PAINTING & FINISHING DETAILS: https://youtu.be/8Z_LKRMdkX8
